meanings.definition: To become known; to come into view.
examples: Alana, or Honey Boo Boo, emerged as an audience favorite in the hit show Toddlers & Tiaras, a reality TV show about beauty pageants for young girls.

images.alt: Silhouette of man at coming out of water during sunset.

images.caption: A person emerges from the water.

source.title: Silhouette of man at coming out of water during sunset.
source.author: Jacub Gomez

meanings.definition: To make use of, often unfairly.
examples: Some people argue that shows like Here Comes Honey Boo Boo and Toddlers & Tiaras exploit young children for the purpose of entertainment.

meanings.definition: In addition to what came before.
examples: Critics say that child actors are unprepared for fame, and furthermore, that they are unable to protect their own earnings
Some worry that these children will be confronted by viewers throughout their lives and reminded of embarrassing childhood behavior that they would rather forget

images.alt: Photo of one person pointing at another person.
images.description: One person is talking to and pointing at another person.
images.caption: One person confronting another.

meanings.definition: To get in the way of; to prevent something from being done properly.
examples: Some people also argue that participating in a reality TV show does not interfere with a childâ€™s ability to become a happy and productive adult.

meanings.definition: To compel, constrain, or oblige (oneself or someone) to do something
examples: Some states passed laws to protect children under the ages of 14 or 15, but it was not until 1938 that a federal regulation (or law) was passed requiring all states to have a minimum age for workers and limited hours of work for young children.

meanings.definition: To compel, constrain, or oblige (oneself or someone) to do something
examples: Some states passed laws to protect children under the ages of 14 or 15, but it was not until 1938 that a federal regulation (or law) was passed forcing all states to have a minimum age for workers and limited hours of work for young children.

meanings.definition: Any extremely severe or trying test, experience, or trial.
examples: They say that this experience makes them more confident and not afraid to take risks as well as develops leadership qualities in these young people.

images.caption: Sky diving is an experience some people want to have.

meanings.definition: Any extremely severe or trying test, experience, or trial.
examples: They say that this ordeal makes them more confident and not afraid to take risks as well as develops leadership qualities in these young people.

images.alt: Fisheye Photography of Man and Woman Sky Diving
images.description: Fisheye Photography of Man and Woman Sky Diving
images.caption: Sky diving is an experience some people want to have; for others it would be an unpleasant ordeal.

meanings.definition: To state as having existence; affirm; postulate.
examples: Furthermore, they claim that the children are not able to make a decision as to whether or not they want to have their lives recorded and broadcast to the world.

meanings.definition: To state as having existence; affirm; postulate.
examples: Furthermore, they assert that the children are not able to make a decision as to whether or not they want to have their lives recorded and broadcast to the world.
They point to the tragic lives of many child TV stars from the past that struggle with addiction and other emotional problems.
They point to the unfortunate lives of many child TV stars from the past that struggle with addiction and other emotional problems.

meanings.definition: Lowering the pride, self-respect, or dignity of a person; mortifying.
examples: They worry that these children will be confronted by viewers throughout their lives and reminded of embarrassing childhood behavior that they would rather forget.

images.alt: Monochrome Photo of Man Showing Sadness
images.description: Monochrome Photo of Man Showing Sadness
images.caption: When something is embarrassing, a person may be upset with themselves or others.

meanings.definition: Lowering the pride, self-respect, or dignity of a person; mortifying.
examples: They worry that these children will be confronted by viewers throughout their lives and reminded of humiliating childhood behavior that they would rather forget.

images.alt: Monochrome Photo of Man Showing Sadness
images.description: Monochrome Photo of Man Showing Sadness
images.caption: When something is humiliation, a person may be upset with themselves or others.
